awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: After charming her reclusive grandfather and falling in love with the beautiful mountain he calls home, Heidi is uprooted and sent to Frankfurt where she befriends Klara, a young girl confined to a wheelchair.

title: Heidi
